member.name: T:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode
member.summary: Specifies the transmission mode of the pipe.

member.name: F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode.Byte
member.summary: Indicates that data in the pipe is transmitted and read as a stream of bytes.

member.summary: Indicates that data in the pipe is transmitted and read as a stream of messages.

member.summary: Represents the method to call as the client.

member.summary: Indicates that there are no additional parameters.

member.summary: Indicates that the system should write through any intermediate cache and go directly to the pipe.

member.summary: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server with an infinite timeout period.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server and monitors cancellation requests.
member.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
